Verb *list*
************

Documentation for the list verb in */cmds/verbs/list.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``list``
 |  ``list from <someone>``
 |  ``list <something> from <someone>``

List items sold by a vendor, list items from a specific vendor, or list spades sold by the salesperson.
